TopicTitle: What is your Top 3 most useful mods

Articles.Content:
I wonder what are your Top 3 most useful mods and why.

For me:

1. MechJeb: I used it to plan my moves and help guiding in delicate situation. Most of the times I do not use auto-pilots.

2. Lazor docking cam: As the mod is intended to. DOCKING!!!

3. Subassembly loader: should have been in the game as is. Useful to re-use things

And now what yours?

Edited June 4, 2013 by JaySmoka
My list is much the same... MechJeb, Lazor Docking Cam, where I digress is some hacks I did myself on some stock parts... Smaller lower powered RCS blocks and such.

mechjeb for smartass

Kerbal alarm clock

KSPX for a few more parts - (the 2.5m nerva in particular)

MechJeb: For the Smart A.S.S., stats and for auto-launching.

CrewManifest: for swopping crew around at space stations.

KSPX: useful parts especially the X200-48 fuel tank.

1. Kerbal Engineer Redux

2. Crew Manifest

3. Kerbal Alarm Clock

(Thats all the mods i have though xD)

Back in 0.19 i used mechjeb too, but i thought with 0.20 i better start trying without it. But I have to admit that i miss it sometimes for really boring and repetitive flights.

Part add-ons:

1. KW Rocketry

2. NovaPunch Reloaded

3. <insert part add-on here>

Plugins:

None.

Mechjeb--------> (Lots of useful info windows! )

KSPX-----------> (adds a lot of stuff that should be in the stock game, and that will eventually be implemented).

KW Rocketry----> (Can't play KSP without my beautiful and realistic lifters!)

Edited June 4, 2013 by astropapi1

• Mechjeb
  • Kethane
  • Subassembly Saver/Loader

Wouldn't leave home without them

Non-part mod :

1. MechJeb

2. Crew Manifest

3. Subassembly loader

Part mod :

1. Soviet Pack

2. KW Rocketry

3. Kosmos Space Station Part Pack

-Maneuver Node Improvement

-Kerbal Alarm Clock

-Kerbal Crew Manifest

1. Mechjeb

2. Subassembly loader

3. Kerbal Alarm Clock

I've got to go with KW Rocketry for number one on me. I absolutely love the payload fairing system, and the extra engines it gives are great for getting my satellites into orbit. The Novacorp Remix pack is also nice for the variety, but it's more of a flavor of the week kind of deal with me. My third slot is empty, since I can't find a mod that adds dozens of assorted satellite parts

the only one i ever always install is mech jeb. i use kethane sometimes (though i wish it would loose the alchemy). i dont think i use a 3rd regularly. but i use my own mod pack a lot because those were parts i always wanted but were never available without downloading a bunch of megapacks.

1- MechJeb (I use all of it. Hate me.)

2- KW Rocketry Pack

3- Subassembly Loader (even if it hates struts and fuel lines)

- MechJeb2

- KW Rocketry

- HydroTech RCS

Right now my HydroTech is broken and I'm wEAPING.
